com.lightbend.lagom.javadsl.api

Interface Service.SelfDescribingServiceCall<Id,Request,Response>

  • All Superinterfaces:
    ServiceCall<Id,Request,Response>
    Enclosing interface:
    Service

    public static interface Service.SelfDescribingServiceCall<Id,Request,Response>
extends ServiceCall<Id,Request,Response>
    A self describing service call. Self describing service calls return generic type information that is otherwise lost due to type erasure. They are typically implemented by the Lagom framework, which inspects the return types of service calls.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods

      Get the type of the ID.

      java.lang.reflect.Type responseType()
